# zendesk_tickets (Resource)

Provides a ticket resource.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# API reference:
#   https://developer.zendesk.com/api-reference/ticketing/tickets/tickets/

resource "zendesk_tickets" "example" {
  subject     = "Example Ticket"
  description = "This is an example ticket"
  priority    = "normal"
  status      = "new"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `description` (String) The description of the ticket.
- `subject` (String) The subject of the ticket.

### Optional

- `assignee_id` (Number) The ID of the assignee.
- `group_id` (Number) The ID of the group.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `organization_id` (Number) The ID of the organization.
- `priority` (String) The priority of the ticket. Allowed values: urgent, high, normal, low.
- `requester_id` (Number) The ID of the requester.
- `status` (String) The status of the ticket. Allowed values: new, open, pending, hold, solved, closed. Defaults to `new`.
- `tags` (Set of String) Tags for the ticket.
- `type` (String) The type of the ticket. Allowed values: question, incident, problem, task.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The time the ticket was created.
- `updated_at` (String) The time the ticket was last updated.
- `url` (String) The API url of this ticket.
